headline: 3 Reasons BBY is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Best Buy’s shares (currently trading at $62.90) have posted a disappointing 15.4% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 7.3% gain. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
